Who: LEGACY, Rat Trap, Tuscon, Quickstride, Kup
Location: Area outside of t=
he Black Fortress

> "Wheels! Lord Elder, This is Rat Trap, Wheels was comm=
n' out with the others, but Rodimus told 'em ta go, he did, but he just tur=
ned around and now he's gon' back in for Rodimus! I dunno if he's gonna be =
able ta come out in one piece!"

Lord Elder's voice came back on the same c=
hannel, "What?!?" Elder
paused, obviously taking a moment to digest what ha=
d been sent to him
in a few short words. "Rodimus told him to go back? Wher=
e is Rodimus
now, and where is Tuscon?"

"Tuscon?" Elder said, trying to co=
ntact Tuscon directly, although Rat
Trap could probably hear it as well, "W=
hat is your situation?"

> Inside, Tucson's many wheels turn rapidly as he =
tries to reach Rodimus. Because of his failure two years past, he tries to =
redeem himself by actually succeeding in bringing out his comrade alive. He=
 knew the attempt could endanger his life as well, but by Primus he had to =
try. He sounds his horn three more times, hoping that Rodimus would hear hi=
m.

Tuscon is quickly able to reach the wall of debris that stood between
h=
im and Rodimus. The wall looked to be quite thick and impenetrable,
however=
 not as impenetrable as it had before Tuscon had left the first
time.

Dirt=
 and stone and even bits of plant matter still filled the
entrance, but it =
is obvious that the previous explosion had weakened
the slide of debris in =
several places. The smell of sulfur was in the
air, obviously coming from t=
he other side of the slide.

(TAG)

Meanwhile . . .

Who: CYCLONUS, Hydras
=
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

The door to the throne room was flu=
ng open, and there standing in the
doorway was the dirty and dented form of=
 Cyclonus. He was covered from
nearly head to toe in dirt, soil and other b=
its of immediately
unidentifiable matter.

"Hydras!" Cyclonus said as he sp=
otted his commander and sprang into
the room. "What has happened?" Cyclonus=
 attempted to grab his scanner
and then realized that he had lost it somewh=
ere. He glanced around for
a moment and then grabbed one from near the thro=
ne and began running
over Hydras, "Are you okay?"
